Q1Below is my answers.
To be honest, I'm not that confident since I couldn't figure out the definition of RTT in this case.
Happy to get any comments.I assumed RTT = 1 x propagation delay in this case as handshaking takes 2 RTT.
(a) Total time = 2RTT + Tp + Tt x 1500 = 1.44sec(b) Total time = 2RTT + (Tp + Tt + Tp) x 1500 = 241.36sec(c) 2RTT + 1500/20 x RTT = 6.16sec(d) up to 11RTT (1,2,4,...512,1024) happens.
Thus, 2RTT + 11RTT = 1.04sec
